Name: Gunlocked
About the game: A twin stick shooter without the twin stick, Gunlocked is all about careful positioning and upgrade selection. Manage unique targeting systems across multiple weapons and upgrades, as you battle legions of alien ships, and hope you're strong enough to defeat the mothership! Then do it all over again with a new strategy. You only control movement, but every weapon has its own unique targeting system that you can influence. Features in the current build: Action-roguelite gameplay Rich, 2d pixel art graphics 21 Powerful upgrades 3 Unique playable pilot characters 11 unique enemies w/ multiple variations 5 powerups to collect An evolving boss that gets more powerful as you do 10+ Steam Achievements Gamepad support Every playthrough is unique
